dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Map bordered by grape vine decoration.; Includes table of distances, ill., text blocks, and insets: Harbour of Realejo -- Isthmus and railroad of Panama -- [Cross]-Section from Port S. Juan del Norte to Port Realejo -- Harbour of San Juan del Norte.|80 x 105 centimeters, on sheet 94 x 119 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,520,000|General Map Collection
